means: 配置( configure的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The RCS must be in the CONFIGURED state before this operation is performed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在执行这个操作之前,该RCS必须处于CONFIGURED状态.

sentence.Network_en: The FTPS Server is configured such that no file retrieval is possible.
sentence.Network_cn: FTPS服务器是组态的,这样无文件检索变为可能.

sentence.Network_en: This list is usually configured by the system administrator.
sentence.Network_cn: 此列表通常由系统管理员配置.

entry.def: If you configure a piece of computer equipment, you set it up so that it is ready for use.
